title: Sargent Art Plastilina Modeling Clay, White, 5 Pound, Non-Hardening, Long Lasting & Non-Toxic, Great for Kids, Beginners, and Artists
description: Sargent Art Modeling clay is the perfect non-toxic clay that will not stain, crumble, or dry out. It is long lasting and non-hardening with consistent color in every stick that will serve you well in every project. Ideal for modeling, sculpting, prototypes, claymation and more. Use the wide array of our colors for mixing and blending!
